item.title: Calculating Prime Numbers in SQL
item.description: Ever needed to calculate prime numbers in a SQL database? No? Here is the query anyways: with recursive primes(i, d) as ( select generate_series(2, 10000), 2 union select i, (select min(i) from primes where i > d) from primes where d <= (select sqrt(max(i)) from primes) and (i <= d or mod(i, d) != 0) ) select i from primes where d = (select max(d) from primes) order by primes.i ASC You can try it out here.
